tasks.title: Set up development environment
tasks.description: Install Node.js, npm, and set up a code editor like VS Code.

tasks.title: Create React App
tasks.description: Generate a React application using Vite with TypeScript support.

tasks.title: Design Homepage
tasks.description: Create a responsive homepage layout with a navigation bar and footer.

tasks.title: Implement Authentication
tasks.description: Add user login and registration functionality using JWT.

tasks.title: Connect to Backend API
tasks.description: Integrate the app with the backend API for fetching and posting data.

tasks.title: Test Application
tasks.description: Conduct end-to-end testing to ensure all features work as expected.

tasks.title: Deploy Application
tasks.description: Deploy the app to a cloud platform like Vercel or Netlify.
